alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Orange, southeastern Addison, northeastern Rutland and northwestern Windsor Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brandon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Barnard, Bethel, Stockbridge, Rochester, Chittenden, Brandon, Pittsfield, Pittsford, Goshen, Sudbury, Killington, Proctor, Hubbardton, Leicester, Randolph, Royalton, Castleton, Mendon, and Bridgewater. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 24 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
